name: Acid Flood
description:
I'm a college student who make games qite long but I never get managed to release any of them. That happend mostly because I wasn't able to finish any of  my complicated and big game ideas. After reaching end of 2020 I realized that I won't be able to release another game which I was working on and I finally decided to start smaller, smarter and just better. And that's how Acid Flood was born.  Learn more about me.

Follow me on Twitter or Facebook.

Thanks for the assets

This guys let me develop  this game to actual version just beacuse of their free assets, so thank you guys.

In-Game music:

https://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/ 

Main Menu music:

https://freesound.org/people/CarlosCarty/

Game Finished sound:

https://freesound.org/people/FunWithSound/

Game Over sound:

https://freesound.org/people/myfox14/

Feedback

I would really like to know your opinion about my game. What do you like? What do you hate? What is your best score?... Every sort of feedback is appreciated!
